name: React Todo List
description: Small responsive todo app made with React. Can mark tasks as complete to temporarily hold them at the bottom with an option to delete to declutter.

name: Simple JavaScript Calculator
description: A simple calculator for simple artihmetic computations. Developed using vanilla JS. Characters and calculations are parsed and tokenized manually without usage of built-in JS methods for logic practice.

name: Huddle Landing Page with Alternating Feature Blocks
description: A challenge I completed from frontendmentor.io. I used this challenge to become proficient at organizing SCSS and taking into consideration multiple device queries. Fully responsive.

name: Four Card Feature Section
description: Another frontendmentor.io challenge. One of the earlier challenges I used to learn clean CSS implementation. Fully repsonsive.

name: About Me Page
description: A small About Me page I made on my first year of college. I didn't want to just make a graphic design piece, so I went to make a small page. Just to refamiliarize myself with basic frontend.
